title: How to learn Nextjs
content: Nextjs, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS. As of 2023, 98.7% of websites use JavaScript on the client side for webpage behavior, often incorporating third-party libraries.
author: krishna
metadesc: Learn Nextjs in few minutes, I will teach you nextjs in few minutes
